com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SpenSettingViewInterface

    public class SpenView
extends View
implements SpenSettingViewInterface
    This class provides the functionality for the Pen user interface. This class uses the S -Pen touch information and/or a user finger to interact with the canvas. This class inherits View and provides handwriting functionality, animation and multimedia data object compatibility.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • captureCurrentView

        public Bitmap captureCurrentView(boolean includeBlank)
        Get the bitmap of the current view.
        Parameters:
        includeBlank - Set to true to include a blank in the captured bitmap, set to false to capture only the screen without the blank.
        Returns:
        The Bitmap instance of the captured screen. Recycle the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError

      • capturePage

        public Bitmap capturePage(float ratio)
        Get the bitmap of the current page.
        Parameters:
        ratio - The ratio to apply to the captured image.
        Returns:
        The Bitmap instance of the current page. Recycle the bitmap after use to prevent memory leaks.

      • setToolTypeAction

        public void setToolTypeAction(int toolType,
                     int action)
        Set the specified action for the specified tool type.
        Specified by:
        setToolTypeAction in interface SpenSettingViewInterface
        Parameters:
        toolType - The tool type. The valid values are: SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_UNKNOWN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_FINGER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_SPEN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_MOUSE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_ERASER, For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.
        action - The action for the tool. The valid values are: SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_NONE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_GESTURE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_STROKE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_ERASER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_COLOR_PICKER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_SELECTION, For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.

        public int getToolTypeAction(int toolType)

        getToolTypeAction in interface SpenSettingViewInterface
        Parameters:
        toolType - The tool type. The valid values are: SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_UNKNOWN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_FINGER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_SPEN, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_MOUSE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.TOOL_ERASER, For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.
        Returns:
        The current action for the tool type. The valid values are: SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_NONE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_GESTURE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_STROKE, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_ERASER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_COLOR_PICKER, SpenSettingViewInterface. SpenSettingViewInterface.ACTION_SELECTION, For more information, see Field Detail in the SpenSettingViewInterface class reference.

      • setPageDoc

        public boolean setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc,
                 boolean isUpdate)
        Set the specified PageDoc instance to the current view.
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The PageDoc instance that you want to set.
        isUpdate - Set to true to update the screen, set to false to not update the screen.
        Returns:
        true – if the PageDoc instance is successfully set. false – if the PageDoc instance is not set.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.

      • setPageDoc

        public boolean setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc pageDoc,
                 int direction,
                 int type,
                 float centerY)
        Set the specified PageDoc instance with the specified direction and transition type to the current view. If the PageDoc width is greater than the screen width, an OutOfMemory exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        pageDoc - The PageDoc instance that you want to set.
        direction - The page direction. The valid values are: PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_LEFT, PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_RIGHT, For more information, see Field Detail in this class reference.
        type - The page transition effect. The valid values are: PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_TYPE_SHADOW, PAGE_TRANSITION_EFFECT_TYPE_SLIDE, For more information, see Field Detail in this class reference.
        centerY - The position to move to after setPageDoc is called.
        Returns:
        true – if the PageDoc instance is successfully set. false – if the PageDoc instance is not set.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Thrown if there is insufficient memory available.

      • setSmartScaleEnabled

        public void setSmartScaleEnabled(boolean enable,
                        Rect region,
                        int effectFrame,
                        int zoomOutResponseTime,
                        float zoomRatio)
        Enable or disable smart scaling. (Not guaranteed on Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich API level 14).)
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable smart scaling, set to false to disable smart scaling.
        region - The region in which smart scaling operates.
        effectFrame - The number of zoom effect frames.
        zoomOutResponseTime - The time to wait after hover exit event for the zoom out operation to start.
        zoomRatio - The hover zoom ratio.

      • isSmartScaleEnabled

        public boolean isSmartScaleEnabled()
        Check if smart scaling is enabled.
        Returns:
        true – if smart scaling is enabled. false – if smart scaling is not enabled.

      • setHorizontalSmartScrollEnabled

        public void setHorizontalSmartScrollEnabled(boolean enable,
                                   Rect leftScrollRegion,
                                   Rect rightScrollRegion,
                                   int responseTime,
                                   int velocity)
        Enable or disable horizontal smart scrolling.
        Parameters:
        enable - Set to true to enable horizontal smart scrolling, set to false to disable horizontal smart scrolling.
        leftScrollRegion - The region in which left smart scrolling operates.
        rightScrollRegion - The region in which right smart scrolling operates.
        responseTime - The time to wait after the hover exit event for the scroll activity to start.
        velocity - The scroll velocity in pixels.

      • setReplaySpeed

        public void setReplaySpeed(int speed)
        Set the specified speed for replaying objects drawn on the canvas.
        Parameters:
        speed - The replay speed. The valid values are: 0 : SPEED_SLOW 1 : SPEED_NORMAL 2 : SPEED_FAST. The default value is SPEED_NORMAL

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Thrown when the native canvas is null or the index passed is less than 0.

        Enable or disable dotted line display.
        Parameters:
